title: Sketchbook Folio, "Lamentation over the Body", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at upper left: 39; at lower left: Bonone Ferrara; at lower center: Scarselino Ferrara
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Left drawing of body of Christ reclining at lower left; Virgin, faces front with arms outstretched towards Christ. Angel atop clouds above. Right drawing of body of Christ resting in lap of Virgin; two Marys lean towards her from left and right. St. John behind her at left. Two male figures, one with turban at middleground. Two angels on clouds above.
